GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: served up an article object corresponding to the passed article id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: served up an array of all comments corresponding to the passed article id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a comment object corresponding to the passed article id and returns it

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: served up a modified article object corresponding to the passed article id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: served up an comment object corresponding to the passed comment id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: served up a modified comment object corresponding to the passed comment id

GET /api/users.description: served up an array of all users

GET /api/users/username.description: served up a user object corresponding to the passed username
